entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:51 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then south 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
